mapper.insert: insert into board values( seq_board_idx.nextval, #{m_idx}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_filename}, sysdate, #{b_isfixed}, #{b_ip}, 0, 0 )

mapper.delete: delete board where b_idx=#{b_idx} and m_idx=#{m_idx}
